author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb
content: If you see fraud and do not say fraud, you are a fraud

author: F Scott Fitzgerald
content: Whenever you feel like criticizing anyone, just remember that all the people in this world haven’t had the advantages that you’ve had

author: Robert Louis Stevenson
content: Perpetual devotion to what a man calls his business, is only to be sustained by perpetual neglect of many other things
